channel.title: Abortion
channel.description:
I just realised we dont have a thread about abortion.
For me I find it quite simple, try to maximise happyness and minimise suffering.
It is on this basis that civilised societies allow abortions up to a limit. They balance the suffering of a fully grown conscious woman and her family against the suffering of an unborn foetus which is unlikely to be capable of suffering.
Of course I'm just an angry militant immoral athiest who wants to make you all eat aborted babies and put them back in the womb so I can abort them again. And I HATE APPLE PIE!

[/quote]

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:55, topic:304971”]In my opinion, I’d want my life forfeited if I was going to be born in a third world country; there’s certainly nothing for those people to miss out on.[/quote]Have you ever actually been to one of these “third world countries”, or do you just assume it’s like the campaigns on TV with 5 year olds drinking their own urine and eating their own flesh?

Read full topic

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I tend to agree with what Mopman said above. In my opinion, I’d want my life forfeited if I was going to be born in a third world country; there’s certainly nothing for those people to miss out on.
The same stands for being born into a troublesome home.

And no, being a child of the state (an orphan in an orphanage) is not particularly good. It’s lackluster at best when compared to the life of the average child. Not being adopted by someone is the same as being rejected in the minds of a child. Rejected by society. I can imagine that would do a lot of damage to someone so impressionable.

Read full topic

item.title: Abortion
item.dc:creator: @_Ryequis `Ryequis
item.description:
@_Ryequis wrote:

I fully support abortion. There are more reasons to support it than there are to oppose it.

A fetus is not a child, no matter how you look at it. Even though the fetus has the ability to be a human, so do eggs and sperm. This means that every man who has ever masturbated, or any woman who has had a period can be considered a murderer.

Not to mention, a majority (9 out of 10) abortions take place before the 12 week mark. At 12 weeks, a fetus is about 3-4 inches long, and weights about one ounce. It’s also just completed development of it’s major organs (not all of them, mind you. If you truly consider that a human, I suggest you take anatomy.

Read full topic

She shoulda made her BF wear 8 condoms. Its her fault she became pregnant, you act like she got cancer.

wat if she was raped?

Then she needs to stop getting drunk

wat if someone broke into her house while she was sleeping and raped her in bed?

lock her fucking door

wat if they broke though the window and it was secured with runite bars but they had a d saw and cut through it?
